name: streamdeck-typescript
description: This library will help you build elgato stream deck plugins in typescript

scripts.build-example: browserify -p tsify example/counter-pi.ts | terser -cm --comments false -o dist/bundle-pi.js && browserify -p tsify example/counter.ts | terser -cm --comments false -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch: start watchify --debug -p tsify example/counter.ts -o dist/bundle.js && start watchify --debug -p tsify example/counter-pi.ts -o dist/bundle-pi.js
